Text.Name: BPQuenchingMethods_test1
Text.Desc: One of the most basic remold spells for physical cultivators. Each time the spell is cast, the target part will go through standard remolding once.

Text.Name: BPQuenchingMethods_test2
Text.Desc: One of the most basic remold spells for physical cultivators. Each time the spell is cast, the target part will go through standard remolding once.

Text.Name: BPQuenchingMethods_test3
Text.Desc: One of the most basic remold spells for physical cultivators. Each time the spell is cast, the target part will go through standard remolding once.

Text.Name: BPQuenchingMethods_1
Text.Desc: One of the most basic remold spells for physical cultivators. Each time the spell is cast, the target part will go through standard remolding once.

Text.Name: BPQuenchingMethods_1_1
Text.Desc: One of the most basic remold spells for physical cultivators, equals using Acupoint Remolding for 8 times in a row. Each time the spell is cast, the target part will go through standard remolding eight times, and the last time will result in at least one rare evolution direction.

Text.Name: BPQuenchingMethods_2
Text.Desc: Remold spell used by wild demons. Costs more essence to stimulate the physical body in order to create more evolution directions. Each time the spell is cast, the target part will go through remolding once that creates more evolution directions.

Text.Name: BPQuenchingMethods_3
Text.Desc: Uses the unity of the six directions to work the essence, which weakens its trait but offers high efficiency. Each time the spell is cast, the target part will go through basic remolding six times.

Text.Name: BPQuenchingMethods_4
Text.Desc: Remold spell invented by the ancient Five Emperors, costs a large amount of essence for its full effect in order to stimulate the body to evolve in rare directions. Each time the spell is cast, the target part will go through remolding once which is more likely to result in advanced evolution.

Text.Name: BPQuenchingMethods_5
Text.Desc: Remolds the body with Derivative Calculation. Each time the spell is cast, the target part will go through standard remolding nine times, and the last time will result in at least one rare evolution direction.

Text.Name: BPQuenchingMethods_6
Text.Desc: Remolds the body in accordance with the Purple Star Astrology. Each time the spell is cast, the target part will go through standard remolding 14 times, and the last time will result in at least one superb evolution direction.

Text.Name: BPQuenchingMethods_Sp1
Text.Desc: Uses Firestruck Blood to stimulate the essence for remolding. Although the number of evolution possibilities for each time of remolding is small, there will be a higher chance of advanced evolution. If this method is used to remold the spine, there is a low chance for it to mutate and develop potential for the evolution of all the bones.

Text.Name: BPQuenchingMethods_Sp2
Text.Desc: Uses Illusion Remold to stimulate the essence for remolding. Although the number of evolution possibilities for each time of remolding is small, there will be a higher chance of advanced evolution. If this method is used to remold the brain, there is a low chance for it to mutate and develop potential for the evolution of all the organs.

Text.Name: BPQuenchingMethods_Sp3
Text.Desc: Uses Transcendent Heart to provide Rejected Power to stimulate the essence for remolding. Although the number of evolution possibilities for each time of remolding is small, there will be a higher chance of advanced evolution. If this method is used to remold the heart, there is a low chance for it to mutate and develop potential for the evolution of all the flesh.

Text.Name: BPQuenchingMethods_ReQuenching
Text.Desc: Since the Qi product is rejected by the refiner's body, it uses Immortal Essence to reset all the remolding results in a certain part to return it to the mortal state.
